lead_paragraph: Ferrari, Red Bull and Formula One world champions Mercedes will be first to test Pirelli's wider 2017 tyres in August, Pirelli's racing manager Mario Isola said at a Monaco Grand Prix presentation on Saturday.

headline.print_headline: Ferrari, Red Bull, Mercedes First to Test 2017 Tyres
headline.main: Ferrari, Red Bull, Mercedes First to Test 2017 Tyres

snippet: Ferrari, Red Bull and Formula One world champions Mercedes will be first to test Pirelli's wider 2017 tyres in August, Pirelli's racing manager Mario Isola said at a Monaco Grand Prix presentation on Saturday....
